original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽19.2. Vedanāttika🔽Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  vedanā ttika  na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the text of the Paṭṭhāna according to the triads🔽The triad on feeling

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca  adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo
translated: A state associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with pleasant feeling. A state associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with painful feeling. A state associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with pleasant and painful feeling.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya🔽sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya 🔽sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma
translated: A state associated with painful feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with pleasant feeling. A state associated with painful feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling. A state associated with painful feeling is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a state associated with pleasant and neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling.

original: paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya🔽sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca adukkham asukhāya vedanāya  sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta
translated: A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …

analyzed: dhammam paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkhamasukhāya
translated: A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …🔽A resultant factor associated with neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling …

analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo uppajjati  hetu paccayā
